name: Roy Tang
text: Divinity OS, Shadowrun, Skyrim Dragonborn, Witcher 2, Naruto (yes, Naruto, lol) and Monaco. I'm not sure when I'll have time for all the RPGs, but at least I should be set for Steam games for a while, without even counting whatever I get for the rest of the sale
